message.content:
cs.CV, cs.HC, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.CL 

The paper deals with the extraction of joint attention events from images and their use for image descriptions. This involves computer vision techniques for identifying gaze direction and common gaze targets, which falls under the category of computer vision (cs.CV). The paper also discusses the importance of joint attention for understanding social interactions and others' intentions, which relates to human-computer interaction (cs.HC) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The use of joint attention for image captioning and related tasks involves machine learning techniques, which falls under the categories of machine learning (cs.LG) and natural language processing (cs.CL).
